Disable ament_xmllint

I will switch to a pre-commit hook for linting in a follow up PR.

data.author: Jafar Uruç
data.message:
Add robotiq f2 140 support (#18)

* Move f2_85 visual/collision files to a seperate directory
* Update meshes's file paths
* Add f2_140 meshes and urdf files
* Rename robotiq_gripper.ros2_control.xacro to f2_85.ros2_control.xacro
* Fix typo f2 -> 2f
* Add 2f_140 ros2_control file
* Fix closed position value for 2f 140
* Fix path to visual meshes for 2f_85 model
* update 140 to match 85 gripper (#1)
* add dummy link to rotate 2f-140 to match 2f-85

---------

Co-authored-by: Marq Rasmussen <marq.razz@gmail.com>

data.author: Alex Moriarty
data.message:
disable ament_flake8 flake8 via pre-commit

- disable ament_flake8, flake8 via pre-commit reads .flake8 config
- ament_flake8 in ros-tooling didn't read .flake8
- flake8 and black will conflit over single vs double quotes

Signed-off-by: Alex Moriarty <alex.moriarty@picknik.ai>

data.author: Alex Moriarty
data.message:
clang/cpplint include " vs <

With < clang-format will re-order
When re-ordered cpplint complains

data.author: Alex Moriarty
data.message:
serial: Add serial from tylerjw fork

- we would prefer not to use the fork but we need to turn on CI
- when https://github.com/wjwwood/serial/issues/204 or
  https://github.com/wjwwood/serial/issues/283 are closed we can switch

- related to https://github.com/PickNikRobotics/ros2_robotiq_gripper/issues/21

Signed-off-by: Alex Moriarty <alex.moriarty@picknik.ai>

data.author: Alex Moriarty
data.message:
ci: setup CI using script

- Run the same script that packages in ros-controls github org use
- https://rtw.stoglrobotics.de/master/use-cases/ros_packages/configure_repository.html

These will likely fail due to serial not being released for ROS2
- see #21
- https://github.com/wjwwood/serial/issues/204
- https://github.com/wjwwood/serial/issues/283

Signed-off-by: Alex Moriarty <alex.moriarty@picknik.ai>
